message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
Hey Alice, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I'd be willing to pay $105.  What do you think?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $112.5. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $112.5 is still a bit high for me. How about we settle on $110? That would be a good compromise.
I understand you're trying to find a compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $110. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $112. What do you think?
